name: Adventure: A Space Voyage
description:
When all of humanity is collapsing and you need to find a new place for it to live. That can put a lot of stress on your shoulders. A lot is riding on this. Help out the rest of the crew and find out the secret that could jeopardize the Voyage.

I made this piece for my portfolio. I wanted to focus on narrative elements in a game. Character lines, Quests, and Story. I was able to accomplish this through the use of a dialog system that allowed for easy creation of character dialog and quest steps. Pulling these two things together I was able to make a story that the player can experience.

Assets:

  • Pixel Crushers Dialog System:
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/ai/dialogue-system-for-unity-11672
